#summary Development/Operation Tool Chain Project

= Introduction =
This project is a collaborative effort to discuss methodology and successful tool chains that support development and operations life cycle activities.

= Architecture =
 * [http://code.google.com/p/devops-toolchain/w/list?q=label:methodology Methodologies]: Used in the development of development/operations toolchains

 * [http://code.google.com/p/devops-toolchain/w/list?q=label:designpattern Design Patterns]: [http://code.google.com/p/devops-toolchain/wiki/PatternRepository Repository] of practices that are promoted by the devops toolchain project

 * [http://code.google.com/p/devops-toolchain/w/list?q=label:antipattern Anti Patterns]: [http://code.google.com/p/devops-toolchain/wiki/PatternRepository Repository] of practices which have definite disadvantages
